Name: Sports team captain tenure
Description: This type connects team captains to their teams.

Properties.Name: Captain
Properties.Description: The person who is or was captain of this team.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: The date this person became captain.

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: The date after which this player was no longer captain.

Properties.Name: Team
Properties.Description: The team this person is or was a captain of.
